response.original_title: One Last Ride: Dallas Braden's Farewell to the Oakland Athletics & Oakland Coliseum
response.overview: From a kid growing up in Stockton, California to a Major League pitcher with the Oakland A’s, Dallas Braden’s journey is nothing short of inspiring. Dallas shares his story on the way to the final home game at the Coliseum where we offer a behind-the-scenes look at the emotional exchanges between the staff, TV crew, and long-time fans. It also features conversations with fans about what it means to lose their beloved team after so many years. A powerful reflection on the end of an era and the deep connection between the A's and their community.
response.title: One Last Ride: Dallas Braden's Farewell to the Oakland Athletics & Oakland Coliseum
